name: @lfsoftwares/ui-theme
description: Biblioteca de tema das aplicações EMC Sistemas
author: Leandro Fernandes <lfsoftwares.solucoes@gmail.com>

scripts.commit:main: cd .. && git add . && git commit -m 'libraries updated' && git push origin main
scripts.pub:main: npm run build && npm version patch --force && npm publish --access public
